001package org.biopax.validator.web.service;
002
003
004import org.biopax.paxtools.io.SimpleIOHandler;
005import org.biopax.paxtools.model.Model;
006import org.biopax.paxtools.normalizer.Normalizer;
007import org.biopax.validator.BiopaxIdentifier;
008import org.biopax.validator.api.Validator;
009import org.biopax.validator.api.beans.Behavior;
010import org.biopax.validator.api.beans.Validation;
011
012import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
013import org.springframework.core.io.DefaultResourceLoader;
014import org.springframework.core.io.Resource;
015import org.springframework.stereotype.Service;
016import org.springframework.util.FileCopyUtils;
017
018import java.io.IOException;
019
020@Service
021public class ValidatorService implements ValidatorAdapter {
022  private final static DefaultResourceLoader LOADER = new DefaultResourceLoader();
023
024  private Validator biopaxValidator; //to inject the biopax-validator
025  private final String schema;
026
027  @Autowired
028  public ValidatorService(Validator biopaxValidator) throws IOException {
029    this.biopaxValidator = biopaxValidator;
030    this.schema = new String(FileCopyUtils.copyToByteArray(LOADER
031      .getResource("classpath:validator-response-2.0.xsd").getInputStream()),"UTF-8");
032  }
033
034  public Validation validate(Resource data,
035                             int errMax, boolean isFix,
036                             Behavior errorLevel, String profile,
037                             Normalizer normalizer) throws IOException
038  {
039    Validation validationResult = new Validation(new BiopaxIdentifier(),
040      data.getDescription(), isFix, errorLevel, errMax, profile);
041    //run the biopax-validator (this updates the validationResult object)
042    biopaxValidator.importModel(validationResult, data.getInputStream());
043    biopaxValidator.validate(validationResult);
044    biopaxValidator.getResults().remove(validationResult);
045
046    if(isFix) { // do normalize too
047      if(normalizer == null) //e.g., when '/check' called from a client/script, not JSP
048        normalizer = new Normalizer();
049
050      Model m = (Model) validationResult.getModel();
051      normalizer.normalize(m);//this further modifies the validated and auto-fixed model
052      //update the serialized model (BioPAX RDF/XML)
053      //for the client to get it (to possibly, unmarshall)
054      validationResult.setModel(m);
055      validationResult.setModelData(SimpleIOHandler.convertToOwl(m));
056    } else {
057      validationResult.setModelData(null);
058      validationResult.setModel(null);
059    }
060
061    return validationResult;
062  }
063
064  public String getSchema() {
065    return schema;
066  }
067
068}
